message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I've done my research and I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product but $900,000 is a bit high for my budget.  Would you consider $700,000?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $700,000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $850,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this.  How about we split the difference and say $800,000?
